full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPE CHOS RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA'I BRDA BKROL DON GNYER YID KYI DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B SMRAS PA, SNA TSOGS YUL GYI BRDA SKAD RNAMS, ,NGES TSIG SO SOR YANG DAG RIG , MTHO BA DE SRID MI DES PHYIR, ,TSOD 'JOG BYAS PA MI RIGS MOD, ,'ON KYANG SNGA PHYI'I TSIG NUS LA, ,BRTAGS TE RNAM RTOG RJING BU RU, ,SHAR TSOD YI GE'I LAM DU SPEL, ,NONGS GANG GZUR GNAS MKHAS LA 'CHAGS, ,SNGON BSAGS BSOD NAMS KYIS BSKRUN PA'I, ,DAL 'BYOR GZHON NU DPAG BSAM LJON, ,CHA SHAS GONG DU 'PHEL BA LAS, ,BSNGAGS 'OS 'BRAS BU GA-YUR ZA BA, ,GANG DE'I RE 'BRAS SMIN SLAD DU, ,GNYIS MED SENG GE'I BRTUL ZHUGS CAN, ,DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS, ,GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA DGE ,'DIR 'BAD LEGS BYAS SNANG BA YIS, ,BLO GROS 'DAB BRGYA RAB PHYE NAS, ,LEGS BSHAD SBRANG RTZI YONGS 'KHYIL TE, ,SKAL BZANG BUNG BA DGYES BYED SHOG , ,,(SVA STI, LHAG BSAM DAG PAS CHOS SBYIN SPEL BA'I SLAD, ,PAR KO GSAR PA GU LU CHA GAN SHOG ,DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG THABS MKHAS KYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,'DI MTSON DGE BAS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,MTSAN LDAN BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RJES BZUNG STE, ,'JAM MGON BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA LA, ,THOS BSAM BSGOM PA LEGS PAR MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,)
